casebody.data:
CENTRAL RAILROAD COMPANY OF NEW JERSEY, A CORPORATION, PROSECUTOR, v. STATE BOARD OF TAXES AND ASSESSMENT ET AL., DEFENDANTS. NEW YORK BAY RAILROAD COMPANY, PENNSYLVANIA RAILROAD COMPANY, LESSEE, PROSECUTORS, v. STATE BOARD OF TAXES AND ASSESSMENT ET AL., DEFENDANTS. Decided May 2, 1925.

Before Justices Kalis ch, Black and Campbell.

For the petitioners, Edward P. Stout. Pee Curiam.

The petition for a rehearing in both cases is denied.
